channel.title: Css?
channel.description: Alright well I am starting to "try" and create my own website. Anyways I am having a problem figuring out how to set multiple images in a CSS as the background for the entire site. Instead of using tables in html. So anyone know how I can do this?

item.title: Css?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

FastBawlz:

You only click once to post. What don’t you understand? Jeez.

Clicking twice actually doesn’t double post. Once you click post, it disables the form, so what happened with my post was a server error.

Read full topic

item.title: Css?
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:7, topic:201592”][quote author=xxlegitxx link=topic=266266.msg2201571#msg2201571 date=1208832444]
Or have nested tags, each with it’s own background image.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 21, 2008, 04:48:44 PM[/size][hr]Or have nested tags, each with its own background image.
[/quote]

You only click once to post. What don’t you understand? Jeez.

@billy

:\ I guess you really didn’t do a good job googling then, here you go:
http://www.htmldog.com/ptg/archives/000107.php[/quote]

i found that about 2 hours ago… forgot to say something but thanks for telling me again.

item.title: Css?
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

FastBawlz:

Erm, CSS Style sheet? The SS in CSS stands for Style Sheet so…

Erm, CSS Style sheet? The SS in CSS stands for Style Sheet so…
[/quote]

He’s talking about the cascading style sheet style sheet. What don’t you understand? Jeez.[/quote]

Well sorry -.- When i was browsing on google for an answer with just CSS in it everyone called it a CSS style sheet. And im glad you guys decided to spam instead of help!

Read full topic
